channel.title: glib on gobbi
channel.description: Recent content in glib on gobbi

item.title: bitfields
item.description: AsciiType GAsciiType ASCII_ALNUM 1 ASCII_ALPHA 2 ASCII_CNTRL 4 ASCII_DIGIT 8 ASCII_GRAPH 16 ASCII_LOWER 32 ASCII_PRINT 64 ASCII_PUNCT 128 ASCII_SPACE 256 ASCII_UPPER 512 ASCII_XDIGIT 1024 FileTest A test to perform on a file using g_file_test(). GFileTest FILE_TEST_IS_REGULAR 1 %TRUE if the file is a regular file (not a directory).

item.title: constants
item.description: ANALYZER_ANALYZING G_ANALYZER_ANALYZING ASCII_DTOSTR_BUF_SIZE A good size for a buffer to be passed into g_ascii_dtostr(). It is guaranteed to be enough for all output of that function on systems with 64bit IEEE-compatible doubles. The typical usage would be something like: |[char buf[G_ASCII_DTOSTR_BUF_SIZE]; fprintf (out, “value=%s\n”, g_ascii_dtostr (buf, sizeof (buf), value)); ]| G_ASCII_DTOSTR_BUF_SIZE BIG_ENDIAN Specifies one of the possible types of byte order. See #G_BYTE_ORDER. G_BIG_ENDIAN CSET_A_2_Z The set of uppercase ASCII alphabet characters.

item.title: enums
item.description: AsciiType GAsciiType ASCII_ALNUM 1 ASCII_ALPHA 2 ASCII_CNTRL 4 ASCII_DIGIT 8 ASCII_GRAPH 16 ASCII_LOWER 32 ASCII_PRINT 64 ASCII_PUNCT 128 ASCII_SPACE 256 ASCII_UPPER 512 ASCII_XDIGIT 1024 FileTest A test to perform on a file using g_file_test(). GFileTest FILE_TEST_IS_REGULAR 1 %TRUE if the file is a regular file (not a directory).
